name: CPS_9_6_Information_View
title: CPS.9.6 Information View (Function)
purpose: Views of the information can be tailored for or by the user (or department or "job classification‚Äù) for their presentation preferences, within local or facility established rules. For example, a nursing supervisor may elect or prefer to see summary data on all patients as the default view.

statement.label: CPS.9.6#01
statement.requirement: The system MAY provide the ability for administrators to capture preferences (e.g., by user, role, or context) for rendering information.

statement.label: CPS.9.6#02
statement.requirement: The system MAY provide the ability to capture a user's preference for rendering information.

statement.label: CPS.9.6#03
statement.requirement: The system MAY manage role-based data-capture-options.

statement.label: CPS.9.6#04
statement.requirement: The system MAY manage role-based data-rendering-options.

statement.label: CPS.9.6#05
statement.requirement: The system MAY provide the ability for authorized users to render information according to personal preferences and/or organizational policy (e.g., by tailoring the presentation of certain information).
